game.name: PAYDAY 2: Dragon Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 페이데이 갱이 새 하이스트 및 꾸미기와 함께 돌아와 샌프란시스코의 차이나타운에서 귀중한 황금 용 조각상을 훔칩니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Payday Gang is back with a new heist and new cosmetics, stealing a priceless gold dragon statue in Chinatown, San Francisco.
